### DERIV
Calculates the derivative over time of a numeric field using linear regression.

```esql
TS k8s
| WHERE pod == "three"
| STATS max_deriv = MAX(DERIV(network.cost)) BY time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp,5minute), pod
```
